website_summaries.verdict: Nuheara promises noise cancellation and hearing enhancement with its wire-free IQBuds earphones, but their performance doesn't merit the high price.
cons: Noise cancellation isn't up to par with competitors

customer_reviews.title: IQ Buds
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for listening to my surroundings whilst going out. I liked the various filters on the device which allowed me to let environmental sounds come through while I was listening to music, so I was aware of what was going on around in my environmental space, it does a good job of amplifying sounds and gives me control of that’s. What I didn’t like about this was the issue I had with charging, after each use I would place these in the charging case only for them not to be charged when I would next use them also both earbuds needed to be in to be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kamal Tiwari

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great, noise cancellation works properly too
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, noise cancellation works properly too. What would improve the product would be a more premier case/charging dock, for the price it should look state of the art. Instead it looks too regular
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buds did not charge
customer_reviews.text: The case charges but the buds do not. It was like this on arrival. The case lights indicate that the case is charged but never once go on to indicate anything about the buds. Successfully returned.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Shocking build quality
customer_reviews.text: Connecting can be a bit fiddly but once connected they work okay. But be aware that mine have started to come apart which means charging is now a pain. It started within a year but because of traveling I wasn’t able to return for an exchange/refund. To be honest I didn’t expect that these days. I have asked Nuheara to suggest a repair, but so far their advice is to buy a new pair...I won’t be doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful connection
customer_reviews.text: Sound ok, good noise cancellation and controls, but irrespective of price, the connection is terrible. I had to keep my phone in a top pocket to keep connection. Whilst outside in the city, my phone couldn't stay in my pocket and keep connection. That's really poor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly did not charge
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give a proper review as the earbuds would not charge. I think due to the internal circuit board needing a certain amount of voltage in order to operate and to charge and having been on the shelf for long enough for the voltage in the battery to fall below operating levels and effectively killing the buds before they could be used but was given a full refund. A pity as I had seen very positive reviews of the technology. Hopefully others will be luckier and have newer stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it !!! Its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Buying the new ones as soon as they are out, such an amazing earphones they are AWESOME !!! And such an exceptional experience better than any earphone i ever used
customer_reviews.author: AzizS09

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to charge and from where I'm sitting all but impossible to pair - quite useless straight out of the box! I returned mine for a refund. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: the review team

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, best in ear buds I've tried... and I've got most of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: As good as any 20$ earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Sound amplifying if kind ok; however: - Sound quality is as any 20$ earbuds - Bluetooth connection is useless, I have to place my phone (iPhone X which works well with any other bluetooth devices I have) in a very specific way and not farther than few inches to be able to use them. Mostly, I need to hold it in my hands; - Noise cancellation is just a myth, no matter what settings I chose, I still hear everything around me and to reduce the noise I need to turn the volume up like any non-noise cancelling earbuds. Ended up returning them after couple of days
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Far from ground breaking
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good. Packaging is ok. Sound is off on one bud - considering return.
customer_reviews.author: P Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Don’t do what they should, no good for me, a lot of money for what they are, I sent mine back because they don’t do what they say they do
customer_reviews.author: truthfully

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones ever !!!!!!!! Not comfortable ! Do not fit in my ears, always coming out without even any movement.I have tried all the sizes. DO NOT WORK WITH SNAPCHAT CALLS IN ANDROID !!!!! I bought three of them one for myself and two as a gifts and I totally REGRET IT.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Great product for listening to music and improving minor hearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for listening to music and improving minor hearing loss. Easy to use out of the box after small time charging. Good instruction Apps available. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: But, they are incredibly good !
customer_reviews.text: Nice, way above my expectations! The earbuds are in high quality. Something that could have been better is the design of the earbuds, making them more compact. I feel like they’re a little bit too rickety, not that it ruins anything other than my ocd.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Martinsen

customer_reviews.title: tech support is useless, worse experience I have had with a product ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does NOT work with iPad, tech support is useless, worse experience I have had with a product purchased here
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It's not a hearing aid.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to see if it would be a low-cost option for improving my hearing in certain situations. You can adjust response from your mobile phone, but not from the device itself. It has helped my hearing in crowded situations or where lots of people are talking at once satisfactorily for the most part. But it's not a hearing aid. Think of IQbuds as like having a stereo equalizer in your ears to adjust treble and bass. Primary dislike: battery life should be longer. And it amplifies wind noise if you're outside and a breeze comes up. Which defeats the purpose. Not a bad purchase, but not a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not really impressed. Maybe it's just not for me. I never leave the ambient mic on. I found it kind of annoying. When I listen to music or a podcast I want to shut the world out, not still listen to what going on around me. I would rather a decent set of wired ear buds and just leave one earbud out if I needed to. Quality of the earbuds is good. The inside top part of the case come off and I had to superglue the magnet and cover back on. Also, sometimes the buds don't align to the pins in the case and don't charge.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Ganzer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool ear buds. Work very well! I just really wish they worked for longer between charges. It is not a deal breaker but it would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: They aren't bad and they help with the hearing I lost due ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently had brain surgery and was needing more isolation on demand, so I looked into these. They aren't bad and they help with the hearing I lost due to Olivary Degeneration. If you are on market for wireless buds I do recommend them, but a word of caution; do daily ear cleanings with an ear irrigation. They will stay on better that way and reduce gunk build-up/ I use food grade HP 1:3 with warm water
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my farther who is hard of hearing and dislikes using headphones that have wires or blocks out his surrounding. He uses them all the time, he can hear when someone is talking to him, while listening to an audio book or music. Also enhances his hearing so he can hear better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok, but these have a lot of problems. If I put my phone in my back pocket, they don’t work, so basically you have to hold your phone close to your ear for them to get a signal. The voice clarification doesn’t work at all. Also, they don’t stay in if I tip my head forward to look down, no matter how I try to adjust them. Lastly, there is no way to turn them off, so they just start squealing. A disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: aimless

customer_reviews.title: Common Nuheara, I just want to give you a good review...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, once is coincidence but twice??? I’m either doing something wrong or you guys have some serious problems with your earbuds. This is the second box I’m going to have to return because the earbuds are not charging. The case has charged 100% but the buds are still dead after 24 hours. No red or green light indicating a charge. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Brennen Dopwell

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for market
customer_reviews.text: The buds work, but have serious drawbacks. BT range extremely poor, generally a few feet at best. Poor audio quality from media sources, very shrill, no bass. Did try larger ear buds. All the functions do work as advertised. The implication, although not specifically stated, is that they are noise canceling, which is not true. It simply has several EQ settings for various situations. The acoustic sound isolation is so poor that World Off is ineffective. The product is a great idea, but not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.author: richard g pelland

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Like these better then my studio3, same sound quality but with the added noise adjustment. My are a little buggy, randomly goes beep crazy in the ear that controls phone answer and pairing( aka left ear ) and randomly drops my calles. I'm give 4⭐ because noise distinction, i need to be able to pick up voices better, but room for improvement 😉
customer_reviews.author: JON TOLBAIN

customer_reviews.title: Horrible feedback in left ear!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine and when trying to set them up I get this horrible feedback sound in the left ear!!! Gods above, what hearing I have will be destroyed by these things!!! I can't review battery life or noise cancelation, so I gave those a neutral "3" rating. But if setup kills your hearing, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Premazon

customer_reviews.title: I have bought many Bluetooth headsets and these are the worst, by far I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay in AT ALL. I have never in my life have had headphones actively try to escape your ears constantly... I learned a lot of bluetooth headphones because I go through them pretty quick because I'm rough. These things are super fragile and on top of them being fragile they don't stay in your ear. I'm 6ft and that's it long drop to the hard ground... do the math kids...
customer_reviews.author: gregg john

customer_reviews.title: Beat expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. It has great battery life and sounds great while also filtering out background noise. It is smaller than I thought and I never realized how usefull a fully wireless earbud could be. The only thing that is a little unusual is the slight screeching sound that the buds make when closing the case, but thats the only time it'll happen. Aside from that the touch controls work perfectly, and I definitely recomend! Its worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay, but wouldn't stay secure in my ears.
customer_reviews.text: I tried all the different rubber adaptors, but couldn't get the buds to stay secure in my ears. Other than that they worked okay, but I did return them after several weeks of trial.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Love these buds. I bought them thinking they were just headphones, but they ended up being so much more. The battery life and multiple charges in the case are impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Good for its price
customer_reviews.text: Really helps my Tinnitus because I can put different masking tones and still hear. Battery life could be better and outside noise cancellation is a little weird. All in all a great product for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Lugo

customer_reviews.title: (Sigh) sorry, they just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure that this I see a fine product, and possibly I received a defective set of earbuds. However, I did not achieve any significant improvement in hearing speech, nor did I note any suppression of other noises. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Thomas La Roche

customer_reviews.title: Poor bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Terrible bluetooth connectivity. They cut in and out even when your transmit device is in your pocket. I tried several phones with these and they still have the same poor reception quality. Updated software....no difference. Sent units back under warrenty....new ones have the exact same poor reception.
customer_reviews.author: John E Kocis

customer_reviews.title: Great for working or doing workouts at gyms.
customer_reviews.text: I use my headphones at work to mix my music with my surroundings. They are also good at removing background audio. I don’t think the noise cancelling is as good when compared to some other pairs I’ve had, but I don’t think it’s bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Its Not Work !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and I saw it with a defect, I did not carry a unit, they sent me another one and that one came worse, neither of the two uniddes carry, I asked my wife to do the procedure, I thought I was wrong, and nothing, the product does not really work
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: After using them once a day for 3 months one ...
customer_reviews.text: After using them once a day for 3 months one has completely stopped working and the other comes apart and will not stay together but continues to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: It’s not like it’s not a good product it is but I ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not like it’s not a good product it is but I Didn’t realize you are not supposed to go a long time with out change it and now it won’t change it was because I had an ear problem and I couldn’t wear them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow, I can hear now things I didn't know I was missing.
customer_reviews.text: these are fantastic. everything I expected and more. So easy to setup and adjust to my hearing capabilities. No blue tooth problems and I have one ear that is weeker and wow it was so easy to adjust for it. So thankful I found them and look forward to your upgrades to come. My wife is more excited than me. I don't miss anything. Now I will have to remove them to do seletive hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting balance back after a car accident. Helping with vertigo.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after they were reviewed on Unboxed Therapy. These are terrible. The sound quality is not good and the feature of ambient sound is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Garbage pairing. Sound enhancement is too tinny and inconsistent. The case is just large enough to be cumbersome. Comfortable enough. Just not worth the price tag. Get $20 Bluetooth earbuds and you're just as well off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised not sweat proof .batteries not as good.not a clear sound especially for phone use.average music sounds.if i had to go back i will never buy them for 50 dollars because it is not worth the price that advertised for.very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Everything needs to arrive in there packs such as the charger cords if it dont then look out.
customer_reviews.text: It was used there was ear wax on both of the ear buds they wont change Nasty. One of the set of ear buds were chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Mojena

customer_reviews.title: I GOT A DEFECTED PAIR! Real nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I CANT BELIEVE THIS! I ordered them two days again and got them today and they have Plenty if time to charge, and the Earphones aren’t connecting??? ARE YOU SERIOUS??? This is BS!! I tried everything already! OMG
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are way too mediocre to have a $300 price tag. I couldve gotten a pair of AirPod pros which are better in every way and still have $100 left over
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Charging station wasn’t charging the buds. Sent back in for refund. Took around a week to get my money back
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible at canceling out background noise!!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not cancel background noise at all. Everyone I talk to complained about hearing noise in the background even after I’ve turned the world function off. I wouldn’t recommend or buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omg no words can describe love them. Works very well especially with the app ...
customer_reviews.text: Omg no words can describe love them. Works very well especially with the app if you take the time to set them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: In sorry but these were complete garbage. They didnt even work. When they arrived the packaging was all messed up and the quality felt like some cheap chinese knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great customizable noise canx
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but the noise cancellation is one of the best I own. I also have AirPods pro which also have great sound but the noise can’t isn’t nearly as good nor is it as customizable as these are
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: To expensive and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wont stay in my husbands ear. the buttons broke after a month. No return or warranty as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD, TURN BACK
customer_reviews.text: The product is not worth the price. No doubt they have much more improvement to do. The rubber detached from the earbud and because the 4 magnetic dots no longer reached to be charged they STOPPED WORKING completely even though the other earbud was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vivían

customer_reviews.title: I charged it and the battery life light for the earbuds dont work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't turn on and it is a piece of crap it was almost dead when it came in and the earbuds didnt even turn on
customer_reviews.author: Robert delach

customer_reviews.title: Horrible warble in right earpiece. I didn’t pay $250 for a defect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the function of these, great for construction work in loud places. But there is a horrible high pitches warble in the right earpiece on all of the settings except Bluetooth only. I just can’t use any of the other useful settings because of it. For $250, I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: 0zwin

customer_reviews.title: Eduardo
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I decided to buy the nuheara IQbuds but I’m mad because I spent alot money and the left ear doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo rezende

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t turn them on
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to even turn these on, MIT helped by the typically minimal instruction manual. I should have trusted the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: C. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: They’re Just Fine
customer_reviews.text: There are some cool aspects of these headphones. The ability to have to outside world come into the headphone is nice. The Bluetooth range is not that good. The case is to big to easily put in your pocket. Honestly I can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bachy

customer_reviews.title: Bad echo
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, but after charging and testing them I had an echo that distorted the sound so I sent them back. They also did not do anything to help my minor hearing loss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wouldn't charge
customer_reviews.text: The case would charge but not the buds. I sent them back on Amazon's advice.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stuart Murray

customer_reviews.title: Spend some money on better materials Nuheara
customer_reviews.text: Broke within days, I hope the next version is not so cheaply made. Spend some money on better materials Nuheara. Save your money buy something else
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: great concept great product just kept falling out of my ...
customer_reviews.text: great concept great product just kept falling out of my ears no matter what I tried connectivity and sound were good maybe if they had different sizes for different ears. returned with no issues thank you.I wish they would have worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: screeching mic feedback sound when charging, why???
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite useful for me since I can only hear with one ear as my right ear is totally dead due to mumps. Music playing is fine as long you experiment and get the fit for your ear. However the problem is when you are charging them, they emit a screeching sound like the mic is picking up feedback!!! Can anybody provide a solution for this? This will be a perfect product minus the mic feedback in the charging case.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Paul Paras

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but way to easy to fall out if yiur ears which can be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Dady Mansaray

customer_reviews.title: Trash if you dont have a warrenty
customer_reviews.text: The right earpiece came defective and I didnt get warranty. The one that does work sounds great but if you're gonna buy, be careful if you're buying only the earpieces without the warrenty. They gotta get rid of defective merchandise somehow ig 🤷
customer_reviews.author: Luis Balderas

customer_reviews.title: Constant feedback
customer_reviews.text: Gives constant feedback while in ear and opening case. So loud and frequent it's impossible to deal with & coworkers will hate it even more. For nearly 300 this is not acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bryan Rank

customer_reviews.title: Need some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I was stoked for these headphones to arrive. Was looking forward to their adaptive listening qualities. I put them in and was first a little off put by the sound quality. They were not at the same level as my Bose Soundsport Wireless and then I tried the "Blended Audio Worlds" everything from outside sounded like it was coming through a tin can. I didn't want to give up on them so I updated firmware and took them on a trip and again they left me wanting. If these were a $150 pair of headphones I would have given them 3.5 stars but at $299 I expect more quality from the drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Danielowski

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones but they don't hold a charge that ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones but they don't hold a charge that well. if you charge it fully then don't use them for a day or two the battery will die. They also can't connect to your phone if it's in your pocket. You have to hold your phone up or you lose connection. Overall they are good headphones but have to many really bad problems that make it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Musico

customer_reviews.title: May work better for you????
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these earbuds were a fail for me!!!! I tried all the different ear canal adapters and none fit right! Maybe it's me... also the Bluetooth connection kept dropping from my 7+ iphone. The sound quality was good only for the very short time the buds would stay tightly fitted in my ear canal which I could NOT achieve for more than 35 seconds. Then they would pop out of my ear completely during the use of a stationary reclining indoor bicycle...., please take into account that every individual is different!!!! The results you get may be better..., Ray from San Jose, Ca
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Ray

customer_reviews.title: These are better for people who use ear buds a lot rather ...
customer_reviews.text: Way over priced. Because there is no wat to turn off the power, they need to be in use or charging or they'll run out of power real fast. These are better for people who use ear buds a lot rather than just occasionally or rarely.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Battery has ruptured in one of them. I most ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery has ruptured in one of them. I most certainly would not buy these. Had since July. I’m hoping I get all my money back. Not swapped out. Just flat returned. For $300 there’s no reason these should do that. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity issue cannot even put your phone on your pocket, it will disconnect
customer_reviews.author: John Paulo Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is tinny and requires me to charge it ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is tinny and requires me to charge it after every workout. For the money you should get more
customer_reviews.author: Jackrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great concept....bit
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but fails with its synthetic base... and I’m not a big music listener!! I don’t want to hear cracking cheap base when I spend $270!
customer_reviews.author: Deano Dambro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Generally nowhere near as nice as they seemed like they'd be. No bass in music, real world amplification ineffective, limited app fuctionality., charging case hard to open, LED indicators on charging case confusing. Product has a long, long way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M. Cath

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as hoped
customer_reviews.text: These did not perform as expected. My biggest hope was that I might have an easier time hearing in loud environments like a loud restaurant or the like. They helped maybe a little bit. I still struggled to hear conversations. Was not worth the money to me. I returned the ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh W. Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and DON'T work!
customer_reviews.text: They don't even work right out of the box how should we expect this product to last a long time! 😡😡😡 save the headache 🤕 don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliano Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Poor Bluetooth Performance
customer_reviews.text: The really poor bluetooth range of these earbuds render them unusable. You can not even put your phone in your front pocket without it not start clipping the music playing. I had my phone on my desk and while sitting in my chair I turned my head to the left and lost my bluetooth signal. They sound really good, they should for $300, but because of the bluetooth performance I decided to return them after less than a days use. I current have a much less expensive pair of truly wireless earbuds that totally outperform these in terms of the bluetooth performance. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tony manino

customer_reviews.title: Amplification is nice. Quality is average
customer_reviews.text: Amplification is nice. Quality is average. Biggest downside by far is that the bluetooth connection is incredibly weak. The only way I can maintain a consistent connection is to keep my phone in a left shirt pocket. The connection drops in and out if I put my phone in *any one* of my pants pockets. This simply isn't practical so I am sending them back. For what it's worth, I own multiple bluetooth devices and don't have this issue so it isn't a phone problem.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Maloney

customer_reviews.title: No way would recommend these. Idea sounded great but reality was extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: These did not work at all. No way would recommend these. Idea sounded great but reality was extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Halliday

customer_reviews.title: Overrated.
customer_reviews.text: Overrated. There is a lot of noise from them rubbing your ear while you are wearing them. They are also a little on the big side, looks weird when you have them on. Charging case and the way the headphones charge is a little suspect. Mine didn't charge the left ear until i jiggled it. The amplification of outside sounds didn't sound normal no matter what setting I tried. Unbox Therapy guy sucks for acting like these were so cool.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Most  uncomfortable pair of headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these headphones after reading all the reviews. After I finally got it I could not find a comfortable place to fit it in my ears. My ears are absolutely killing me after wearing it. I am returning these
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Confusing interface on the app. The right ear piece didn't even have sound coming out of it. This is a half baked product. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Tipton

customer_reviews.title: ... you get them set to your surrounding they work great i work in automation so there are always loud ...
customer_reviews.text: once you get them set to your surrounding they work great i work in automation so there are always loud noises and they will automatically shut out high frequency noises which was nice but i could listen to music and have a conversation with co-workers. the only problem was that my ears are to small and not with the buds in the ear canal the units sit in the outer opening of your ear which for me was too small for the housing of the electronics of the buds.
customer_reviews.author: jerry liversedge

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds actually sound better and are more versatile than my wired Bose headphones. I have MS and I cannot stand loud environments and that is the reason that I purchased my ear buds. They not only block out back ground noise but the music sounds as if you are at the concert its self! If you have minor hearing issues, they can also be programmed through their phone app to increase background sound for you. There is nothing else out there like them. A little pricey but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D.

customer_reviews.title: I find them fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: My son- tech geek- loves these. I find them fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: peter s lippe

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Well, out of the box I wondered if this unit was a "return" because the package was not sealed. I downloaded the required app and performed all the "adjustments" and did the demo. None of the adjustments appeared to do anything. Even the DEMO didn't provide any noticeable changes during adjustments. I was really looking forward to trying this high dollar product thinking I could adjust these buds to accommodate the hearing differences in my left/right ear (moderate hearing loss). Needless to say....DISAPPOINTED. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: I keep these plugged in when I’m not using them ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep these plugged in when I’m not using them but for the third time since I bought them a couple months ago I arrived at the gym, put them in my ears and they report a low battery and turn off, ruining my morning. Wish I had returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Offermann

customer_reviews.title: The sound of music does not come out of both ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound of music does not come out of both of the buds. Only the left bud gives you the sound of the music. Also, the buds disconnect frequently from your phone so the music or show you are listening to goes on and off. The description and quality that is given on the internet make them very unreasonably priced. They are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Farrell

customer_reviews.title: The real world sound volume is much to low
customer_reviews.text: The primary reason I made the purchase was to use the personal amplifier feature, but it did not work well. Often I could hear the real world better if I removed the IQbuds. The bluetooth worked great, good sound quality, nifty phone app for making adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: ouraydog

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Hard to get 'em to stay in the ear sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Zweig

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but came apart. Searching on how to get replacement going. I bought the extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Hart

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a daily basis and while they sound decent they dont sound like 200 bucks my case broke within the first 2 weeks the headphones take forever to charge they make an extremely loud high pitch noise every time i put them in their case its hard to get them in the right place in the case to charge
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Purchase a Warranty Also!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in January 2018 & they no longer work. Only able to hear out of one sporadically. I should have purchased a warranty because now I am out of my money with paper weights!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lamonicaj

customer_reviews.title: I've had them for a good while now
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for a good while now, I like them a lot but the novelty kind of wears 9ff after a whole. Only real issue I have is that they can be kind of painful to wear for long periods which is probably what you'd want to wear them for since they can be used as extra ears, but i have found ways to make them fit better and have mitigated that problem a bit. A bit pricey but if you want high quality ear buds and don't expect them to be as good as bose over ear headphones like some of these people, you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Not so new...
customer_reviews.text: First off, When the package came I could tell that the ear buds had been used. So not new.. none of the items were in the correct spot where they should have been in the box, just scattered about. Not a good first impression. Ear goop on the earbuds(they could at least cleaned them), the case that holds the buds was scratched on the outside,🙄🙄 When ever I put the earbuds in they would make a loud feedback into my ear not the best feeling every time I use them. Had high hopes for these... To be fair the sound quality was pretty amazing, and the app is fun. Definitely not worth the big bucks for a used product though.
customer_reviews.author: Brogen

customer_reviews.title: The concept of these is great! Quality sound with the ability to bring in ...
customer_reviews.text: The concept of these is great! Quality sound with the ability to bring in outside noises if you want, or completely shut them out with the active noise cancelling. Unfortunately, I had to return them after two days because the the bluetooth connection on these are spotty at best. With my phone in my front jeans pocket, the sound would cut in and out constantly. The get started guide even warns of a low connection when the phone is near your waist, but a high connection when your phone is near your shoulder. WHO CARRIES THEIR PHONE ON THEIR SHOULDER?!?!?! I am returning and getting something that promises better connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Only work for a while, and product support is torture
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are great when they work, the problem is that is only for a little while. We've contacted the manufacturer, and they have made us jump through so many hoops it's ridiculous. Unfortunately I missed the window to return it to Amazon. I suggest you find another option if you want wireless earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tenna Merchent

customer_reviews.title: First time buy ear phone
customer_reviews.text: The music mode is pretty good. The noise cancellation not work well than I thought. I think this ear phone still have so much of possibility change better. The home mode never find correct date to make it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Must Wait Till Market Matures
customer_reviews.text: I was so ready to splurge on these and I had done all my research before I settled on Nuheara, despite some bad reviews. I bought them and showed them off but sent them back after a weekend of use. They made my ears cramp after about 30 minutes and the right earbud would have some terrible feedback and hurt my ear. I decided the $300 was not worth it and I could wait until better ones hit the market.
customer_reviews.author: Gcrusher

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds are comfortable, Bluetooth is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Let me say, these earbuds are very comfortable and the mixture of the external sound with the audio is a pretty cool function. There is one major problem. The Bluetooth connection is HORRIBLE. I had my phone sitting on my desk, on my left side (that's where the Bluetooth antenna is), literally 3 feet from the earbuds and they continually cut out. Don't even think about putting your phone in your pocket! Basically if you are not keeping your phone on your left side, above your chest, the connection is spotty at best. For $300 I should be able to have my phone anywhere on my person and not have to worry about losing a connection. Returned after two days.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Rizzo

product_meta.title: Nuheara IQbuds Intelligent Wireless Earbuds
product_meta.description:
Advanced Speech Amplification Nuheara’s SINC Super Intelligent Noise Cancellation technology enhances users’ ability to hear speech in noisy environments, such as crowded restaurants, pubs, parties, networking events, outdoors, sporting events, conferences and more. This is not simply noise amplification. IQbuds let you drown out ambient noise while elevating speech above the noise for much clearer conversations. High-end Sound Fidelity The truly wireless earbud category has been associated with average music quality. IQbuds deliver high-end sound fidelity with great base, powerful volume if you want it, and clarity you come to expect from high quality over-the-ear headsets. Blended Hearing IQbuds introduce real augmented hearing in a truly wireless earbud. Users can blend their digital streaming audio with their physical world to create a powerful blended audio experience and maintain situational wariness when desired. Tap Touch Control Consumers navigate between IQbuds features with simple tap touch control on the ear. The important tap touch capability is unique to Nuheara and gives you control of music, phone calls and the ability to orchestrate a listening experience by effortlessly moving from your physical world to digital world and back again, all without the need to touch your phone. Battery Life A single charge of IQbuds provides 4 hours of on-the-go Bluetooth streaming and 8 hours of on-the-go hearing augmentation with up to 16 total hours of on-the-go Bluetooth streaming and 32 total hours of on-the-go hearing augmentation when used with the included Charge Case. The Customizable iOS and Android Nuheara App A simple-to-use App that lets individuals customize how they hear the world around them drives the Nuheara IQbuds experience. The Nuheara app is both Apple iOS and Android compatible. Nuheara built its app to allow people to customize how they hear their environment and personalize their own listening profiles.

BOX CONTAINS
1 Pair IQbuds Charging Case USB Cable 8 Pairs of Tips Quick start Guide Registration Booklet
feature_bullets: HIGH FIDELITY AUDIO – seamlessly stream all your favourite music and audio content with tap-touch earbuds designed for comfort. Sweat proof & water resistant too.
SPEECH AMPLIFICATION – enhance speech in noisy restaurants, work events or parties
DYNAMIC NOISE CONTROL – selectively tune in or out the world around you with Super Intelligent Noise Control SINC. Tweak your settings via the customizable App for the best hearing experience
BLENDED AUDIO WORLDS – choose the best blend of your digital music and real world sounds around you for situational awareness
BEST-IN-CLASS BATTERY LIFE – 16 hours on-the-go Bluetooth streaming and 32 hours on-the-go Hearing Processing
